巚字的基本解释

巚
yǎn
同“巘”。

巚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》魚蹇切，上獮，疑。］
［《廣韻》語偃切，上阮，疑。］
亦作“巚1”。
(1)山；山顶。《诗·大雅·公刘》：“陟則在巘，復降在原。”毛传：“巘，小山，别於大山也。”朱熹集传：“巘，山頂也。”一说，巘为上大下小之山，参阅孔颖达疏。
(2)上大下小的山。
(3)险峻。参见“巘巘”。

巚字的康熙字典解释
巚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
巚字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎn］
["Guangyun" fish scorpion cut, upright, suspicious. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Yanqie, Shang Ruan, doubt. ]
Also known as "巚1".
(1) Mountain; the top of the mountain. "Poetry·Daya·Gong Liu": "Zhi is in the market, and the return to the original." Mao Chuan: "Yang, the hill, different from the mountain." Zhu Xi's collection: "Yang, the top of the mountain." Go up and down the mountain, see Kong Yingdashu.
(2) Go up and down the small mountain.
(3) Precipice. See "巘巘".
